divs: Sighting DetailsWalked outside to take a break from working in a doctors office.Was noticing howdark it had got by 6:30pm...while looking up at the sky I saw a point oflight...it started to desend and thats what caught my attention.while it wasdesending I motioned for my associate to look up at it. Several unknown personsstopped at our location and also observed the light.The unknown persons becameexcited and pointed and briefly talked about it and then ran off. Steve andmyself continued to observe the light as it desended, brightened orenlarged,hovered, then asended to approx. to the point that we originally saw itbefore it came down. the speed was medium. After it reached its point of orginit blinked out and was no longer visible.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around October 30th 2000
